settings.title: Asetukset
settings.ip_caption: The IP required for verification is the one that has the highest number of shares submitted during the past 24 hours.
settings.ip_hint: Vinkki: Sinä olet tällä sivulla osoitteesta
settings.ip_description: Jos laitteesi käyttää proxy-välityspalvelinta, ts. laitteesi louhii tuplana ZIL-poolissa, käytä välityspalvelimen osoitetta.
settings.high_fees_warning: Jos ulosmaksurajasi on alle 0.05 ETH, gas-hinnasta tulee korkea ja se vähennetään maksustasi. Suosittelemme asettamaan korkeamman ulosmaksurajan.

payout.title: Ulosmaksun asetukset
payout.eth_mainnet: You payout will be sent via Ethereum Mainnet. This is the main Ethereum network, it is more decentralized and secure, but has a significant transaction fee.
payout.eth_polygon: You payout will be sent via Polygon (L2). L2 offers significant lower transaction fees and your payment will be processed in WETH (Wrapped ETH). Please make sure you understand how this is going to affect your payouts before switching networks.
payout.limit_desc: You will be paid only after your unpaid balance will reach {{value}}. Your entire unpaid balance will be paid out, not just your threshold amount.
payout.gas_limit_desc: Transaktion Gas-hintasi olisi rajoitettu {{value}} {{valueUnit}} ({{valueTicker}}, {delimiter} ulosmaksun rajasta). Ulosmaksuja ei suoriteta jos Gas-hinta on suurempi.
payout.l2_warning: Please make sure your wallet support <bold>{{network_name}}</bold> WETH deposits. Otherwise, your funds will be lost forever.
payout.l2_acknowledge: I acknowledge that my wallet supports <bold>{{network_name}}</bold> L2 network, that the funds will be irreversibly lost otherwise, and that I know how to deal with payouts made in the <bold>{{network_name}}</bold> network.

difficulty.title: Vaikeusasteen asetukset
difficulty.warning: The adjustable difficulty is a feature for advanced users only. We strongly recommend keeping 1 unless you have specific requirements. Please do not change the difficulty unless you know what you are doing.
difficulty.acknowledge: I acknowledge that higher difficulty will make the effective space calculations less precise.
difficulty.pending_difficulty: You have a pending difficulty change of {{difficulty}}. Please wait up to 10 minutes for the changes to be applied.
difficulty.launcher_id_desc: Use the Launcher ID to check the difficulty of your current PlotNFT.
difficulty.launcher_id_error: The launcher ID is invalid, please try again.
difficulty.difficulty_desc: Difficulty determines the frequency of partials. The lower the difficulty is, the more partials you will get. More partials will result in more precise stats.
difficulty.login_link_desc: A Login Link is required to prove you own this PlotNFT.

payout_warning: We highly recommend setting a higher payout limit to reduce total number of payout transactions. Less transactions means less network fees.

You are the only one responsible for paying the transaction fees. We are strongly in favour of setting a transaction fee limit lower to avoid a total loss of money due to high network fees. This will also help you partially mitigate losses when sudden fee spikes happen.

notifications.title: Sähköposti-ilmoitukset
notifications.check_worker_down: Ilmoita minulle, jos laitteeni lopettaa louhinnan
notifications.offline_duration: Ilmoitamme sinulle, jos emme ole saaneet yhtään osuutta louhijaltasi ajassa {{duration}}.

header.greet_desc_farm: {{count}} worker is farming {{coin}} with {{hashrate}} of storage.
header.greet_desc_farm_plural: {{count}} workers are farming {{coin}} with {{hashrate}} of total storage.
header.stat_unpaid_balance_reach_ok: Your payout will be processed on the next hourly payment round if the fee preferences are met.
header.stat_unpaid_balance_reach_ok_l2: Your payout will be processed on the next L2 payment round, which happens randomly every 24 hours.
header.stat_unpaid_balance_reach_delayed_by_gas: However, your payout won't be processed because your gas price limit of <v>{{gasLimit}}</v> is lower than the current network gas price of <v>{{currentGas}}</v>.
header.stat_estimate_tooltip: Click to change between daily, weekly and monthly estimates.
header.time_to_lambo: Your estimated time to Lambo is {{time}}.

avp.title: Keskimääräinen hashrate
avp.tooltip: Calculated based on current round share and the last 3 hours of the pool hashrate chart.

log.title: Osuuslokin tyhjennysaika
log.tooltip: Aika, jonka jälkeen kierroksen osuus putoaa nollaan.

transaction_fees.title: Transaktiokulut
average_cta_tooltip: 1. Jos asetat suuremman ulosmaksun rajan, se vähentää transaktioiden määrää joista sinun täytyy maksaa kuluja.
2. Aseta transaktiokuluille raja välttääksesi isot kulut. Kun ulosmaksurajasi on täynnä, varmistamme että ulosmaksusi transaktio suoritetaan niin pian kuin mahdollista transaktiokulujesi rajoissa.

table_head.value_tooltip: The fiat conversion is based on the price at the time of the payout.

stats.not_enough_data_message: Meillä ei ole tarpeeksi dataa kaavion näyttämiseksi. Jos laitteesi ovat jo louhimassa, datan prosessoinnissa voi kulua jopa 10 minuuttia.

proTips.hoverHashrateProtip: Voit viedä hiiren "Tuloksia tuottavan hashraten keskiarvo" päälle nähdäksesi viimeisen 6 ja 12 tunnin keskiarvot.
proTips.apiProTip: Flexpoolin koko API on julkisesti saatavilla.
proTips.searchProTip: Jos klikkaat hakupainiketta etusivulla, sinut viedään edelliseen tarkastelemaasi osoitteeseen.
proTips.payoutExportProTip: Voit tallentaa kaikki transaktiosi CSV-tiedostoon "Ulosmaksut" välilehdeltä.
proTips.rewardsExportProTip: Voit tallentaa kaikki palkkiosi CSV-tiedostoon "Palkkiot" välilehdeltä.

announcements.the_merge:
The Merge has been confirmed for approximately September 15. After that, the Ethereum mining will no longer be possible. Please read our our official announcement for details.
Check out The Merge Countdown to see how long until The Merge happens.

payout_only_mode_note.title: The pool is in payout-only mode
payout_only_mode_note.p1: You can no longer mine. Please use your last IP address used to update your payout preferences or change the payout network to execute a payment.
payout_only_mode_note.p2: Don't hesitate to get in touch with <supportlink>support</supportlink> if you have a custom request like a balance transfer from one address to another. (A signed Ethereum digital message is required, and it's not supported by exchanges.)

warning_header: Näyttää siltä, että kojelautasi ei ole vielä valmis.
warning_description: Jos olet juuri aloittanut louhimisen, kojelautasi on valmis 20 minuutin sisällä ensimmäisen osuuden lähettämisestä tähän osoitteeseen. Palaa takaisin hetken kuluttua.
pending_description: Your address is recognized by the pool, please wait 10 minutes for the stats to be ready.
